title: How to Make Vegan Bakewell Slice

steps.headline: Make the almond mix first.
steps.description: Mix the white sugar, margarine and light brown sugar together.

steps.headline: Add the tofu, cornmeal flour, baking powder and bicarb.
Add the ground almonds and almond essence and mix well to form an almond mixture.
steps.description: This will go on top of the pastry.

steps.headline: Grease and flour a flapjack oven tin.
Roll out the ready-made vegan pastry to fit the oven tin.
Place the pastry into the oven tin.
Spread apricot jam on top of the pastry.
Pour the almond mixture on top of the pastry and spread evenly.
Bake in a hot oven at 180ºC (356ºF) for 30 minutes, or until it is bouncy.
Remove from the oven and leave to cool down.
steps.description: Then remove it to a cooling rack.

steps.headline: Add vanilla essence and enough cold water to the powdered sugar to form a thick paste.
steps.description: Once the slice is cooled, spread with icing.

steps.headline: Place the glazed cherries evenly across the top of the icing.

text: Make the almond mix first. Mix the white sugar, margarine and light brown sugar together. Add the tofu, cornmeal flour, baking powder and bicarb.  Add the ground almonds and almond essence and mix well to form an almond mixture. This will go on top of the pastry. Grease and flour a flapjack oven tin.  Roll out the ready-made vegan pastry to fit the oven tin.  Place the pastry into the oven tin.  Spread apricot jam on top of the pastry.  Pour the almond mixture on top of the pastry and spread evenly.  Bake in a hot oven at 180ºC (356ºF) for 30 minutes, or until it is bouncy.  Remove from the oven and leave to cool down. Then remove it to a cooling rack. Add vanilla essence and enough cold water to the powdered sugar to form a thick paste. Once the slice is cooled, spread with icing. Place the glazed cherries evenly across the top of the icing.  Cut into slices.  Serve and enjoy.
